article.description: Stephen F. Austin 85, Sam Houston St. 53
article.headline: Stephen F. Austin 85, Sam Houston St. 53
article.linkText: Stephen F. Austin 85, Sam Houston St. 53
article.story: NACOGDOCHES, Texas (AP) -- Dedrick Sanders scored 17 points and had eight rebounds to lead Stephen F. Austin to an 85-53 victory over Sam Houston State in the first round of the Southland Conference tournament Monday night. Hank Rivers scored 11 points and Antonio Burks and Jasen Gast each had 10 points for Stephen F. Austin (20-8). Stephen F. Austin led 41-22 at halftime. The Lumberjacks shot 50 percent from the field to Sam Houston State's 37 percent. Chris Jordan led Sam Houston State (13-15) with 16 points. Jason Stephenson added 10.
